description:
GPS Tracker allows you to track your route and to save this route for later viewing. You are able to save as much routes as you want and it is possible to send this route via Email. It is also possible to export the tracked routes as gpx-file. These files can be viewed with any gpx file reader like Google Earth. 
This App supports Multi-Touch for panning & zooming.
The App also displays information about your current speed, your altitude and it shows a compass.
It is possible to switch between km/h and mph and you can block the screen timeout.

Features:
 - GPS locating
 - GPS route tracking and save/load
 - Exporting routes to gpx files
 - Send routes via Email
 - View all necessary GPS information

This App uses maps from the OpenStreetMap project.
